name: Tilebane
description:
Tilebane - a remake of the classic game "brick breaker"

beat all three levels and you win, that's all there is to it. only its not easy

having trouble winning solo? play it with your friends with local co-op

think you're better than your friends? battle them in vs and pong modes

enjoy.

Controlls:

move the bar to block the ball

Mouse: the bar moves to wherever the mouse is reletive to the outer circle

controller: move the bar with the joystick

(controllers are required to play multiplayer)

Game modes:

solo: play by yourself and try to beat all three levels

multiplayer co-op: work together to beat all three levels

multiplayer pong: each player gets half the circle and if the ball goes out on your side you loose(only two player)

multiplayer vs: play against your friend to get the most points, break blocks to get points and build a combo, if the ball goes out your combo is lost and points are subtracted(vs mode has not been finished and is currently not playable)

known bugs/glitches:

- vs mode isnt finished: still in development, dont play vs
